#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
struct node{
	long long int s;
	long long int f;
}arr[100000];
bool operator <(node const &a,node const &b)
{
	return a.f<b.f;
}
main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	long count=0;
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>arr[i].s;
			cin>>arr[i].f;
		}
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		count++;
		long long k;
		k=arr[0].f;
		for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			//cout<<arr[i].s<<" "<<arr[i].f<<"\n";
			if(arr[i].s>k)
			{
				count++;
				k=arr[i].f;
			}
			
		}
		cout<<count<<"\n";
	}
}
